column2: Arana: The Heart of the Spider (2005) #6
column6:
Storyarc finale! It's high noon in Brooklyn as Araña and her new nemesis face off to settle a very personal score. Meanwhile, duty calls and the true plans of the Sisterhood of the Wasp are finally revealed! Part 6 (of 6).,2005,8
32 PGS./T+ Suggested for Teens and Up ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Fiona Avery | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | penciller:Roger Cruz | inker:Victor Olazaba | colorist:Danny Salgo | letterer:Rus Wooton
